Хороший, збалансований кіберспортивний онлайн-шутер. Ігра добре оптимізована для різних пристроїв, присутня незначна кількість багів (з'являються дуже рідко), хороший мережевий код.
Um dia ainda vou ver este jogo sem cheaters
Great Game Way To Many hackers

Este jogo é simplesmente fantástico! Está sempre a evoluir, com bons jogadores, com bom motor gráfico e tende futuramente  a melhorar cada vez mais , atraindo ainda mais pessoas para este jogo e para esta comunidade! Recomendo vivamente a toda a gente pois nao se irao arrepender!

This game is ruined by cheaters. Almost 3 out of 4 competitive matches are full of cheaters. WH, Radar, Aim, all sort of hacks, and Valve does absolutely nothing to ban them. It takes months before they get a ban. Do not even try to play this game it makes no sense as even smallest hack will ruin the match. It is just frustrating what CSGO has become. They should have never made it free. Make it 60$ and ban harder maybe it will be fun again. Now this game is trash. Do not waste your time with this game. Valve loves cheaters, not you.
whoever gave the idea to make this game free to play is a fucking cucklord and should be shot on sight.
очень крутая игра после того как стала платная читеров гораздо меньше всем советую поиграть.
Top Spiel immer noch, leider sind aber immer noch viele Cheater im Spiel!
eles estão carregados com os codigos em todas as pistas

Abi belli bir seviyeye kadar alt seviye shooter oyunu gibi gözükse de uzun saatler ve yılları ardından o kendinizdeki gelişmeyi ve profesyönelleşmeyi hissetmek inanılmaz bir his. Karakter tabanlı olmayan doğal strateji oyunlarının en iyi kesinlikle budur.

Amazing game however, the new update has allowed me to cue with more hackers even though I have good trust factor. This simply does not make sense and honestly ruins the gaming experience. Valve needs to do something about this as its ruining not only my mine but many others gaming experience. But in general the game is still very fun to play and exciting!
a gente sofre, mas gosta né
